description:
HQSoftware was created by people who faced the same problems you are facing today: a shortage of developers, limited budgets and bad offshoring options. So, we built the company we wish we could have partnered years ago, but lost investment and time trying to find the right one.
 
Along the way we have learned to be an efficient medium-sized team: we focus on quality, not “growing big”; we hire not just professionals - but motivated, open-minded personalities; we meet customers and prefer to have foot on the ground – not virtual relations; we sell not hours of development - but offer solutions.
 
In short, we’re passionate about end-to-end IoT, AR, and VR projects development, alert to context, and focused on results.
